'''Slackware''' is a [[Linux distribution]] created by [[Patrick Volkerding]] of '''Slackware Linux, Inc.''' Slackware was one of the earliest distributions, and is the oldest currently being maintained. Slackware aims for design stability and simplicity, and to be the most [[Unix-like]] Linux distribution.<ref name="info-page">Slackware website [http://slackware.com/info General Information]</ref>
+
'''Slackware''' is a [[Linux distribution]] created by [[Patrick Volkerding]] of '''Slackware Linux, Inc.''' Slackware was one of the earliest distributions, and is the oldest currently being maintained{{fact}}. Slackware aims for design stability and simplicity, and to be the most [[Unix-like]] Linux distribution.<ref name="info-page">Slackware website [http://slackware.com/info General Information]</ref>
